key_risks: Market volatility, particularly in emerging markets
Challenges in consistently applying ESG criteria across diverse international markets
Risk of greenwashing impacting investor confidence
controversies: Potential discrepancies in sustainability assessments due to ESG integration challenges
Scrutiny over the authenticity of sustainability claims
environmental_issues: Focus on sustainable economy sectors like renewable energy and water treatment
social_issues: Catering to institutional investors demanding sustainable investment options
governance_issues: Adaptation to evolving regulatory requirements related to ESG disclosures and sustainable finance
